A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I can sum up this movie in a few 3 word phrases that portray my disappointment and disgust with what was on the screen...

1.  Rose Rose Binks
2.  Luke's "lazer sword"
3.  Flying Leia Poppins
4.  Slow speed chase
5.  Captain Phasma falls
6.  Sea cow milk
7.  Crait is Hoth
8.  Social Justice Drivel
9.  Rey is nobody
10. Chewie is vegan
11. Holding for Hux
12. Yoda acts drunk
13. Snoke's lame death
14. Burning Jedi texts
15. Boring as hell

Fix these issues and you'd have a 5 star movie on your hands.
